price: 18. Ata oyo akolinga koyokamela yango, tokolandisa ye moto
arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱسۡتَرَقَ ٱلسَّمۡعَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: illā mani is'taraqa al-samʿa fa-atbaʿahu shihābun mubīnun
